title: Windows 10 crashs on loading sreen
body:
i played 4 games last night and league crashed 3 out of 4 of them, one game was remade before I got in, the 2nd game it crashed on the loading screen before anything started to load twice. I just upgraded to windows 10 fresh install updated all my drivers and when I do get in game its soo smooth running at high performance with over 500 fps so I have no idea what the issue is, it just isn't something I had before.

also as a side note I had gone twice into training mode which had loaded up fine before I went into any ranked games just to configure my buttons which were still saved? they must do it client side now?

replies.body:
That's pretty frustrating, and I want to help with just a little more info.  To clear things up, by crashing do you mean a bugsplat?  If so then your drivers or game files could be having issues.  A repair might help, as well as our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide.

If there's no bugsplat but a no response error then you could have a network block preventing comms with the game server properly.  Double check your anti-virus settings for that, as well as port forwarding/DNS config in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.
Did you receive any type of errors when you crashed? When you know what error you're getting, it's easier to come up with a solution to the problem.

thanks for answering to this and no it just says after a minute or two of nothing happening but everyone being at 0% and no honers appering "league is not responding" hoever I was having some boot up issues as in it was taking awhile and after asking an IT guy it seems I need a new SSD ontop of the harddrive i just got, which has been ordered and might fix this problem
